title: Saving.Hope.S02E07.HDTV.XviD-AFG
description:
Saving Hope

Genre: Drama, Medical
Year: 2013
Country: Canada
Runtime: 42 min
Producer: Malcolm MacRury
Cast: Erica Durance, Julia Taylor Ross, Kristopher Turner, Michael Shanks, Daniel Gillies, K.C. Collins

.: Plot :.
In "Saving Hope," when charismatic Chief of Surgery Charlie Harris at Hope-Zion Hospital ends up in a coma, he leaves the hospital in chaos - and his fiancee and fellow surgeon, Alex Reid, in a state of shock. Along with newly arrived star surgeon, Joel Goran, Reid races to save Harris' life. As the action unfolds, the comatose Harris explores the hospital halls in "spirit" form, not sure if he's a ghost or a figment of his own imagination. Reid, along with her fellow doctors, press on to save his life and those of their other patients as they deal with the complicated and courageous decisions that are made in their daily struggle to keep hope alive.
